Name: select_user_story_for_sprint
Description: Binary decision variable to determine if a User Story (us) is selected for the current sprint.

Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Variable to assign a specific Worker (w) to a specific Task (tsk).

Name: assign_feature_to_release
Description: Binary decision to include a Feature (f) in a specific Release Plan (rep).

Name: set_sprint_start_date
Description: Decision on which date a specific Sprint (sp) should begin.

Name: allocate_worker_to_team
Description: Decision to assign a Worker (w) to a development Team (t).

Name: prioritize_epic_in_backlog
Description: Integer variable setting the rank of an Epic (e) in the Product Backlog.

Name: set_worker_availability
Description: Sets the percentage of time a Worker (w) is available for the project during a sprint.

Name: resolve_blocker_in_sprint
Description: Binary decision on whether to allocate resources to resolve a Blocker (bl) in the current sprint.

Name: certify_worker_for_skill
Description: Decision to certify a Worker (w) for a new Skill (s).

Name: set_project_budget
Description: Decision variable for setting the total budget for a specific Project (p).

Name: choose_team_for_project
Description: Decision on which Team (t) is assigned to work on a Project (p).
